rooms.description: Open-plan kitchen and living space with floor-to-ceiling windows on one side for natural light. Vastu-aligned entrance and energy flow.
Studio apartment bedroom integrated into the living area; features a private balcony with direct access to rooftop terrace.
Open dining area adjacent to the kitchen. Large window for ambient lighting and fresh air.

openings.description: Stepped access from the living area leading to a rooftop terrace.
